casebody.data:
KARGER
v.
WOOD. No. 8A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 13, 2006. James R. Levinson, Benson, for Lisa Karger.

*666The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of February 2006 by Defendant to withdraw appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of March 2006."
